reference_summary:
Skymore 30ml Fast Hair Growth Serum, Anti-Hair Loss, Hair Thinning Treatment, 100% Pure & Natural, Non-Greasy, Nourishing & Moisturizing, All Hair Types
Skymore
{'Brand': 'Skymore', 'Item Form': 'serum', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 3.94 inches; 3.07 Ounces'}
I waited to write review so this product had time to work or not. It arrived 1July. I used that day & have used everyday as of 28July. There are actual tiny strands of hair growing from my scalp where there hasn't been in 4yrs due to medication needed from a horrific accident. Do exactly as instructions indicate. Product arrived well packaged. As a woman lost hair is devastating. To try products with no results will have most women severely depressed. This product made me smile, laugh, cry, and sob all in that order. It was so much to take in when I saw lil sprout's of my hair growing from my scalp, just amazing.. Definitely worth trying. Only 4 stars because I'm not sure how long I'll have to use or if I stop using will my hair stop growing. Other than that reason I would have given 5 star.. Would recommend.
I have tiny strands of hair where there hasnt been any in 4years
Gejoy 12 Pieces Shiny Scrunchie Elastics Scrunchy Bobbles Metallic Hair Scrunchies for Dance Show Party Gym Club of Women and Girls
{'Item Weight': '0.11 Pounds', 'Number of Pieces': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 4.57 x 0.94 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '797153595056'}
These arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Loved opening these scrunchies. Vibrant colors.... super stretchy.... super strong.... enjoy wearing these. Just pull up my hair and in the scrunchie and I’m off on my way.
Arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Vibrant colors. Super stretchy. Very strong.
FAMILIFE Soap Sheets 12 Packs Portable Soap Paper Disposable Hand Wash Paper Soap Mini Slice Scents Travel Outdoor Use
FAMILIFE
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'FAMILIFE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 1.97 x 0.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '799443862763'}
I used with water and at best there was only a couple of bubbles. Thought for the price I’d try these. Normally purchasing a more expensive brand I now have found is worth the extra $$ after purchasing and using these. Great smell. Easy to use. Arrived well packaged. I used 5 sheets and each and every single time these didn’t bubble up like others. My hands didn’t feel clean after use. Threw the remaining sheets in the garbage.
Hands definitely did NOT feel clean after using these paper soaps. DON’T recommend purchasing.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health and Wellness Focus**: The user continues to prioritize hair health, showing a keen interest in products that promote hair growth and combat hair loss.
- **Emotional Connection**: Their journey with hair care products is significantly linked to personal challenges and self-esteem, highlighting the importance of this area in their life.
- **Skepticism and Expectations**: The user remains cautious towards new products, emphasizing the need for evidence and sustainable results. Recent disappointing experiences have reinforced this skepticism.
- **Product Experience**: They appreciate detailed packaging and clear instructions, indicating a preference for brands that offer comprehensive product support. The user has expressed satisfaction with vibrant, functional accessories in the past.
- **Positive Reinforcement and Broader Interests**: A recent positive interaction with a different type of product indicates a willingness to explore beyond hair care, reinforcing their appreciation for well-packaged, effective items. Their satisfaction reflects a commitment to quality across various categories.
- **Mixed Rating Habits**: While generally rating products around 4 stars, the user has been more critical after negative experiences. Recent evaluations have shown a marked improvement, indicating a balanced and evolving perspective on product quality.

Overall, the user values effective, high-quality products across their health and wellness routine, while remaining open to positive experiences and reassessing their choices based on performance.
